_description: Configuration for cyclic peptide structure prediction

model.name: boltz1
model._comment: boltz1 or boltz2. boltz2 has more features but may require more resources

processing._accelerator_comment: cpu or gpu. Use gpu if CUDA is available for faster processing
processing._diffusion_comment: Number of structure samples. More samples = better diversity but slower
processing._recycling_comment: Iterative refinement steps. More steps = better quality but slower
processing._msa_comment: Use ColabFold MSA server for sequence alignment. Set false for offline mode

validation._validation_comment: Check for valid amino acid characters before processing

output._auto_comment: Generate output directory name automatically if not specified
